import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import './assets/cast.css'; import $ from 'jquery'; class App extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.scroll = this.scroll.bind(this) this.state ={ castBackground:'https://occ-0-894-1123.1.nflxso.net/art/0ef00/005f864851e4be98e96f55020ce769fba680ef00.jpg', title: 'Penny Dreadfull', subTitle:'80% INDICADO / CIENCIA FICCIÓN / 2015 / EUA /14', sinopse:'Contos de personagens clássicos como Drácula, Frankenstein e Dorian Gray estão reunidos nesta série de terror ambientada nas ruas da Londres vitoriana.', width: null } this.selectRef = React.createRef(); } componentDidMount(){ const width = this.selectRef.current.clientWidth; this.setState( { width: width }, () => console.log(this.state.width) ); this.CreateLayout() } CreateLayout(){ document.getElementById('container-2_id').style = `background-image: url(${this.state.castBackground});`; document.getElementById('title_id').innerText = this.state.title; document.getElementById('subTitle_id').innerText = this.state.subTitle; document.getElementById('sinopse_id').innerText = this.state.sinopse; } scroll(direction){ let far = this.state.width/2*direction; let pos = $('.image-container').scrollLeft() + far; $('.image-container').animate( { scrollLeft: pos }, 1000) } render() { return (
